nodes.text: Rebel, Jedi, Princess, Queen: Star Wars and the Power of Costume

Rebel, Jedi, Princess, Queen: Star Wars and the Power of Costume was a traveling exhibition focused on the costumes created for the Star Wars films. Produced by the Smithsonian Institution Traveling Exhibition Service and the Lucas Museum of Narrative Art in consultation with Lucasfilm Ltd., the exhibition toured six museums in the United States from 2015 to 2018.

The costumes were organized in a series of thematic categories. The actual costumes exhibited at each stop along the way varied based on the available space at host museums; some stops also had one-time-only additional costumes.
